thread.section_title: Exceptional Villas Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Exceptional Villas | www.exceptionalvillas.com
thread.title: diana eden
thread.title_full: Exceptional Villas reviewed by diana eden

author: diana eden
title: diana eden
text: Exceptional Villas was very responsive to every email or enquiry, and the service offered and accepted was wonderful. Our villa was five star all the way, as were the staff and management. We felt well taken care of, and we all adored Sea Glass Villa with its amazing views, space, pool, and decor.
